name: Ghul
description: The Ghul is a Medium undead creature that exudes a sinister presence, adept in melee with claws that deal significant damage and can paralyze foes.
memorable: Its death triggers a noxious explosion that can paralyze nearby creatures, making it a dangerous foe even in defeat.
goals: To disrupt enemy plans through tactical combat and control the battlefield with spellcasting.
relations: Often encountered with other undead or evil creatures.
environment: Commonly found in dark, decrepit places or on battlefields.
strengths: Resistant to various damage types and immune to many conditions, allowing for exceptional resilience in combat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to certain forms of attack and relies on Charisma for spellcasting.
attacks: Multiattack with two claw strikes, each capable of paralyzing non-undead foes.
most_powerful_ability: Variable Immunity allows the Ghul to adapt to incoming damage types, enhancing its survivability.
additional_information: Can innately cast spells without material components.
Utilizes a mix of melee and spellcasting abilities for combat versatility.
Features abilities like Paralyzing Throes and Turn Resistance for added tactical advantages.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting includes destructive and utility spells like fireball and misty step.
test_queries: undead creature that can paralyze enemies
medium undead with variable damage immunity
creature that disrupts enemies with spells
